Stages of

Owning Property

Grow Your Capital

Investing in rental properties and collecting rent. Flipping properties by purchasing them at a lower price, making improvements, and then selling them at a higher price. Developing properties by purchasing land and building new structures, such as apartment buildings or single-family homes. Participating in a Estate Marketing investment trust (EMIT) which allows individuals to invest in large-scale, income-producing Estate Marketing. Joining an Estate Marketing crowdfunding platform that allows investors to pool their money to fund Estate Marketing projects.
